text: @TMobile @Tesla Probably a post Covid-19 road trip to Memphis for a barbeque tour...San Francisco -Fisherman's Wharf...Montreal for anything....Savannah for the moss covered trees... & the Grand Canyon -nuf said...not in that order....no eating in the car though😜
